alert.note: Alert for Kiowa County Including Eads; Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 29 at 5:27AM MDT until March 30 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM MDT THURSDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 226 AND 234... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 11 AM to 8 PM MDT Thursday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 226 and 234. * Winds...Southwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 8 percent. * Temperatures...In the mid 60s. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
